headline: Snowflake Stock Is Tumbling on a Disappointing Forecast. The CEO Has an Explanation.
content: The data-software firm projected fiscal 2023 results that were below Wall Street’s estimates. CEO Frank Slootman explains why.

headline: Splunk stock gains following surprise profit, new CEO
content: Splunk Inc. rose in the extended session Wednesday, as the cloud-based enterprise software company reported a surprise profit, topped Wall Street's outlook estimates and named a new chief executive.

headline: Snowflake stock plunges after annual forecast underwhelms
content: Snowflake Inc. shares were clobbered in late trading Wednesday after the software company suggested sales will not grow as quickly as expected this year.

headline: 2 Stocks Flashing Signs of Strong Insider Buying and Analyst Support
content: Every investor wants to cut through the noise, and clear away the static of the market signals, but there are thousands of companies trading on the markets, and they put out all sorts of signs regarding their health, viability, and potential for success. Top investors will learn how to cut through that confusion to find that stock that are flashing the right signs – and show the highest potential for gains going forward.
